TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Stroke extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 表示单个笔划墨迹。

span.span: Represents a single ink stroke.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 从指针设备（如 tablet 笔或鼠标）收集的数据对象。A is the data object that is collected from a pointing device, such as a tablet pen or a mouse. 可以通过编程方式创建和操作，并可以在支持墨迹的元素（如）中直观地表示 。The can be created and manipulated programmatically, and can be represented visually on an ink-enabled element, such as the . 包含有关其位置和外观的信息。A contains information about both its position and appearance. 属性是 对象的集合，这些对象指定的位置 。The property is a collection of objects that specifies the position of the . 属性指定笔画的外观。The property specifies a stroke's appearance.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 根据指定的 对象执行变换。

span.span: Performs a transformation based upon the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示用于在二维空间中进行转换的3x3 矩阵。The object represents a 3x3 matrix used for transformations in two-dimensional space. 笔划对象的每个点都由提供的矩阵转换。Each point of the Stroke object is transformed by the supplied Matrix. 例如，如果原始点 X 值为100，则原始 Point 值为55，而变换矩阵. Scale (0.5，0.5) ，新的 Point 值为50，而新的 point 值为27.5。For example if the original Point.X value is 100, the original Point.Y value is 55, and the transformation Matrix.Scale(0.5, 0.5), the new Point.X value is 50 and the new Point.Y value is 27.5. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何转换 对象。The following example demonstrates how to transform a object. [!code-csharp[DrawTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawTransform/CSharp/Program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DrawTransform#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawTransform/VisualBasic/Module1.vb#1)]
